Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Reroute at Commercial/103rd
ShortDescription: 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via Torrence, 100th and Commercial : due to, street blockage near Commercial/103rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Torrence, 100th, Commercial and over regular route, due to street blockage near Commercial/103rd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #92 Foster Temporary Westbound Reroute near Foster/Elston
ShortDescription: Westbound 92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Cicero, Elston and Foster: due to, street blockage near Foster/Elston.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Westbound #92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Cicero, Elston, Foster and over regular route, due to street blockage near Foster/Elston.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Reroute at 67th/South Shore
ShortDescription: 67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted near 67th/South Shore.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 67th, Cottage Grove, Marquette, Stoney Island, 67th, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near 67th/South Shore.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Eastbound #103 West 103rd Temporary Reroute near 103rd/Central Park
ShortDescription: Eastbound 103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted near 103rd/Central Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 103rd, Pulaski, 99th, Holman, 103rd, and resume normal route: due to, street blockage near 103rd/Central Park.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Oak Park. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Oak Park.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
